Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Peptide L1 (natural AMPs; shrimp, Crustaceans, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; UCLL1)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 47.1% similarity toEumenine mastoparan-AF. Mol Wt: 1837.154; GRAVY: 0.08.Activity:Active against Gram- V. parahaemolyticus (MIC 31.2 ug/mL), V. fluvialis (MIC 62.5 ug/mL), E. coli (MIC 3.9 ug/mL), Gram+ A. hydrophila (MIC 3.9 ug/mL), S. aureus (MIC 62.5 ug/mL), and S. pyogenes (MIC 62.5 ug/mL). Updated 6/2018; 7/2021.
Literature Information.Author: Yang S, Huang H, Wang F, Aweya JJ, Zheng Z, Zhang Y.2018
Literature Information.Title: Prediction and characterization of a novel hemocyanin?derived antimicrobial peptide from shrimp Litopenaeus vannamei
